timeline.bodyText: FWIW at this line and at some other lines, consider simply doing e.toString() thus capturing both the class name & message.  Long ago I once used e.getMessage() but I never call it any more because you're throwing away interesting info in the exception type.  For example a FileNotFoundException's message is simply the name of the file, giving no indication of what the problem is.
